desc.cn: Kubectl 的 BuildKit CLI 是使用 Kubernetes 群集构建 OCI 和 Docker 图像的工具
desc.en: BuildKit CLI for kubectl is a tool for building OCI and Docker images with your kubernetes cluster

darwin/brew.cmd:
brew tap vmware-tanzu/buildkit-cli-for-kubectl https://github.com/vmware-tanzu/buildkit-cli-for-kubectl \
&& brew install kubectl-buildkit
